name: @springboot-cli/generator
description: A comprehensive CLI tool for generating production-ready Spring Boot microservices with Clean Architecture, API-first development, and enterprise-grade observability

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('fs').chmodSync('bin/springboot-cli.sh', '755'); require('fs').chmodSync('bin/cli.js', '755'); require('fs').readdirSync('bin/commands').forEach(f => require('fs').chmodSync('bin/commands/' + f, '755')); } catch(e) { console.log('Permissions set (or not needed on this OS)'); }"

author: Kishen Sivalingam
